article.Heading: GST Helpline: Top tax experts quiz CBEC official
article.Summary: Watch Sanjeev Srivatsa, Commissioner at CBEC answer queries related to Goods and Services Tax (GST) from MS Mani, Senior Director at Deloitte, Pratik Jain, Partner at PwC India, and Harishankar, Partner at EY.
article.Body:
Watch Sanjeev Srivatsa, Commissioner at CBEC answer queries related to Goods and Services Tax (GST) from MS Mani, Senior Director at Deloitte, Pratik Jain, Partner at PwC India, and Harishankar, Partner at EY.

Sanjeev Srivatsa also answered some viewer queries.
